topic.title: Jews have promoted Michael Jackson to corrupt the American youth
topic.body:
Michael Jackson was after his discovery by the Hollywood Jews all the time under their influence
http://www.realjewnews.com/?p=415
MJ was also a good friend of Rabbi Shmuley Boteach and the Jew illusionist Uri Geller.
He was the first person to visit the Museum of Tolerance in Los Angeles.
Michael Jackson requested to visit the MOT the Friday before it opened in 1993 â€” and received a personalized tour from Rabbi Marvin Hier, founder of the Simon Wiesenthal Center.
